title: Just Falafel
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Fast food, Take-out, Fusion, Middle Eastern
description: Part of international franchise chain offering falafel sandwiches in different flavors. Build your own option. Dairy and cheese is used, so vegans should specify. NOTE: As of 2015, this chain is serving meat in many of its locations - please verify if meat is served at this location and let HappyCow know!
streetAddress: La Cite' Mall, Al Mehwar, Al Markazy
